# github_app (Data Source)

Use this data source to retrieve information about an app.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "github_app" "foobar" {
  slug = "foobar"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `slug` (String)

### Read-Only

- `description` (String)
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `name` (String)
- `node_id` (String)
